items.sentence: Tom could be with his friends, but I don\'t think he is.
Tom closed his eyes during the scary parts of the movie.
Tom is very proud of what he\'s been able to accomplish.
Tom realized that he wasn\'t as smart as the other kids.
I\'d like to ask you a few questions if you don\'t mind.
Tom\'s idea on how to fix the broken chair didn\'t work.
Tom knew that Mary wasn\'t likely to be able to do that.
Tom knew that he couldn\'t speak French as well as Mary.
Tom\'s car was parked in front of the convenience store.
Why don\'t you go find someone else who needs your help?
